entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
